Characteristics: High volatility, elevated prices, frequent price spikes
Recommendations:
1. Emergency food subsidies (targeted)
2. Logistics infrastructure improvement
3. Buffer stock deployment
4. Real-time price monitoring & early warning
5. Inter-provincial trade facilitation

Characteristics: Stable prices, adequate supply, predictable market
Recommendations:
1. Continue current policies
2. Surplus management (export/inter-provincial)
3. Regular monitoring (prevent deterioration)
4. Production optimization
5. Support as supply hubs for high-risk provinces
